page.title: 13MEDIA
page.content: Apart from national newspapers,T.V.and radio the Leigh Sinton area is increasingly well-served by local media.The village shop supplies over 500 Worcester Evening News and villagers are frequent listeners to Radio Wyvern,a commercial radio station,based in Worcester and Hereford.Disc Jockeys from Wyvern are prominent in local fund raising events.In addition the Malvern Gazette is delivered free in some areas and provides a comprehensive view of local events.This includes a feature entitled "Village Voice"in which a local correspondent relates notable events specifically from the area of Leigh,Leigh Sinton and Bransford. There is also the Benefice Magazine, "The Sphere"which reflects the many facets of village life and is an important line of communication.
